# Analysis of Discord Chat in "âš¡â”‚general"

## 1. Summary
The chat segment is very brief, containing only a short exchange between Fibelius and jin about the status of v1 backpack in v2 converted applications. Jin indicates that the v1 backpack has not been converted to v2 yet, as they are prioritizing the most frequently used applications first. Jin mentions that significant progress has already been made on most applications, with only additional testing remaining to be completed.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Is the v1 backpack in the v2 converted apps? (asked by Fibelius) A: No, targeting most used apps first. (answered by jin)

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: jin | Helpee: Fibelius | Context: Inquiring about v1 backpack conversion status to v2 | Resolution: Jin clarified that v1 backpack hasn't been converted yet as they're prioritizing more frequently used applications

## 4. Action Items
